Detailed Description

Encapsulates the parameters for a StimPlugin.

An association of name/value pairs. The names are strings and the values are a QVariant (float, int, string, etc -- anything QVariant supports).

Use the toString() method to generate a config-file style string (suitable to pass to matlab clients or to save as a config file).

The fromString() function parses parameters.

Format for the string that the toString() and fromString() functions use is

   name1 = value1
   name2 = value2
   ...etc...
(this is much like the configuration file format for the original StimulateOpenGL)

QString StimParams::toString (  )  const

Creates an ini-style multi-line string of the params. Format is as follows: 

           name1=value1
           name2=value2
           ...etc...

This is basically the same format at the original StimulateOpenGL configuration file format.
